sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-06-27 18:00:07.668065 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-07-12T22:36:45.6088636-04:00.

rdgGrp.n: ['up', '', 'on the earth from whose form and mind', 'man', 'shrunk', 'with', 'horro', '', '<mdel>w</mdel>', 'r', '', '.', '<del>and</del>']
['the sickening oppression of the most terrible reveries.<p-end/>', '<p-start/>']
['shore,', 'and a person landed close to my house.<p-end/>', '<p-start/>']
['deserts of scotland.he was wearing away his time fruitlessly where he was']
['detestation and scorn. man! you may hate;']
['detestation and scorn. man, you may hate;']
['sacrificed,', 'or to see those whom', 'i most loved die under the grasp of a dæmon whom i had myself created.<p-end/>', '<p-start/>']

['he was wearing away his time fruitlessly where he was; that letters from the friends he had formed in london desired his return to complete the negotiation they had entered into for his indian enterprise. he could not any longer delay his departure; but as his journey to london might be followed, even sooner than he now conjectured, by his longer voyage,']
['nearly a year had elapsed since we had quitted switzerland, and france was yet unvisited.']

['nearly a<zone eid="c57-0109__main"/> <surface eid="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0109"/> <surface lrx="5138" lry="7032" partof="#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="55v" shelfmark="ms. abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0110.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0110" sid="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0110"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0110.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sid="c57-0110__main"/> year had <del>passed</del> elapsed since we had quitted switzerland and france was yet unvisited.']
['me to bestow as much of my society on him as i could spare. he besought me, therefore, to']
['perth', 'in a week from that time when']
['perth,', 'in a week from that time, when']
['arrange the plan of our future proceedings.']
['<del>think</del> <zone corresp="#c57-0110.02" type="left_margin" sid="c57-0110__left_margin"/> reflect:', '<zone eid="c57-0110__left_margin"/> i must pack']
['a line of high land towards the south.']
['a line of high land towards the south.<note>thomas copy: pencil mark joins paragraphs.</note>']
['a line of high land towards the south.<p-end/>', '<p-start/>']
['<del>for the</del>', '', '<del>sc</del>', '<del>ene which i shall now relate</del>']
